definition: to shout abuses in the street
shouting abuse in the street like a fishwife

sentences.english: I don't like my wife bitching around.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡我老婆到處潑婦罵街。

sentences.english: Last year's bears and scolds at Davos have become this year's sages.
sentences.chinese: 去年達沃斯上的熊和罵街者變成了今年的聖人。

sentences.english: I do not like my wife bitching around.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜歡我老婆到處潑婦罵街。

sentences.english: Xiangzi had been brought up in a northern village where cursing was taboo.
sentences.chinese: 祥子生在北方的鄉間，最忌諱隨便罵街。

sentences.english: I owe my fishwife day to the prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 我替市政府當一天罵街的。

sentences.english: Only Brew can lead to excitement.
sentences.chinese: 只有罵街才能引來熱鬧。
